meanings.definition: A person who uses drugs illegally.
meanings.sent1: The police arrested the dopers for drug possession.
meanings.sent2: The dopers were caught selling illegal substances.
meanings.sent3: The dopers tried to hide their drugs in a funny-looking hat.
meanings.sent4: The neighborhood was like a jungle, with dopers lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The dopers' den was filled with a pungent smell of drugs.

meanings.definition: A substance used to enhance athletic performance.
meanings.sent1: Athletes sometimes use dopers to improve their strength.
meanings.sent2: The coach warned the team about the dangers of using dopers.
meanings.sent3: The dopers made the athletes run faster than ever before.
meanings.sent4: The stadium echoed with the cheers of athletes fueled by dopers.
meanings.sent5: The dopers transformed ordinary players into superstars on the field.

meanings.definition: A device used to measure the concentration of a substance in a solution.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a doper to check the sugar levels in the solution.
meanings.sent2: The doper displayed the exact amount of salt in the water.
meanings.sent3: The doper beeped happily when the solution was just right.
meanings.sent4: The doper was like a detective uncovering the secrets of the solution.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the doper amazed the students in the chemistry lab.
